title: Fluid Dynamics Virtual Laboratory Education Course Based on Game Engines

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course for professionals to enhance workplace competencies through virtual experiments in smartphone-limited environments. Emphasizes real-world problem-solving via project-based evaluation

learning_goals: Through a virtual jet pump experiment implemented with a game engine, learners can quantitatively analyze fluid flow principles
By solving fluid mechanics problems based on real-world industrial scenarios (RWS), learners enhance their process design capabilities
Learners can collaboratively collect and analyze experimental data in a constrained technical environment (smartphone) and submit project deliverables in report format

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
